Text.val: //Author: Juergen Paarmann
18.10.2012 AS SCR#16046 changed numeric picture for output of invoice amount
27.07.2011 AS SCR#16638. Changes required for new length of invoice numbers
31.01.2011 AS SCR#16118 output error message if Zipcode has invalid format
29.01.2010 AS SCR#15280 added new error handler for invoicing to UHCR countries
//11-11-2005 JP SCR #7589 extend with invoice validation
//16-12-2004 JP SCR #7316 change handling for debtor validation, see SCR
//11-10-2004 JP SCR #7135 add new handling for Debtor ID
//06-05-2004 JP SCR #6116 add new implementation for debtor validation handling
//03-05-2004 JP SCR #6001 add new param in call to ICA - Checkpoint
//29-04-2004 JP SCR #6107 add update on SCHT_USRIDENTERED with ‘AS400’
//29-12-2003 JP SCR #4907 add new message text CA9559
//16-10-2003 JP SCR #4527 submitter note: change handling also for "no country"
//09-10-2003 JP SCR #4527 replace hardcoded country with link to GNRL
//28-05-2003 JP new in order to solve SCR #3416, #3593
//end debtor validation
//merge only if there is at least one error handler
